name: 黃馨瑩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
scorePolicy:
1. Daily Performance: 20%
(a) Check-in Quiz and assignments- 10%
(b) Your attendance and participation - 10%
2. Course Project and Review Exam: 29%
3. Campus-wide Proficiency Test: 30% (期中&期末會考各15%)
4. Remedial class (輔導課程成績): 21%
(a) Dialog Practice- 9%
(b) Weekly Test- 12%
materials:
1. What A World Reading (1)
2. What A World Listening (1)
3. Assigned supplemental materials.
